personalInfo.name: Walid Ghani
personalInfo.title: Frontend Developer
personalInfo.bio: With 5 years of experience as a Frontend Developer, I bring deep expertise in creating high-quality web and mobile applications using React, React Native, Next.js, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js. Have ability to adapt to new technologies also a critical thinker make me a valuable asset to any development team. Lets collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

projects.title: Holymoment
projects.description: A project for hw's user that can be find their photos on outlet using face recognation to automaticly detecting their faces, then they can buy it from this application. There is also dashboard for photographer to upload and sell their photograph.

projects.title: HW Group Website
projects.description: A company profile that including details of their brands, detail of every outlet and detail of every event's outlets

projects.title: Euro Prediction
projects.description: A webview application for predict Euro Cup 2024 that integrated with Holywings App

projects.title: Dashboard SKK Migas
projects.description: Dashboard application for internal system for client SKK Migas client of BNI, with using of Microfrontend technology and Reactjs.

projects.title: Dashboard KKP
projects.description: Dashboard application for internal system that integrated with BNI core banking for credit card application that having approval system depends on user role.

projects.title: BNI Lifestyle: Taksi
projects.description: A webview application using Nextjs and integrated with Bluebird API to built in with BNI Mobile for ordering taksi.

projects.title: Arcelle App
projects.description: A mobile apps for retail store that showing their products and user can checkout to proceed a payment.

projects.title: Onekideco
projects.description: Project for mining company internal system, a dashboard for monitoring and storing data and mobile apps that integrated with the dashboard.

keyResponsibilities: Developed interactive web applications using advanced JavaScript libraries and APIs such as Nuxtjs and Nextjs.
Identify and fix bugs, and optimize existing code for performance and usability.
Optimized user experience across a range of devices.
Ensure applications are optimized for speed, scalability, and maintainability.
Work closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and product managers to translate design wireframes and business requirements into fully functional, responsive, and user-friendly applications.
Developed 8+ interactive web & mobile applications using advanced JavaScript libraries and APIs such as Reactjs, React Native and Nextjs.
Participate in agile ceremonies, such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Create and maintain detailed technical documentation, including design specs, API documentation, and user guides for frontend components.
Develop and execute unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests to ensure code quality and application stability.
Refactor legacy code to improve structure, readability, and performance.
Debug and troubleshoot complex frontend issues, providing effective solutions in a timely manner.
Develop such a mobile application using React Native
Work closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and product managers to translate design wireframes and business requirements into fully functional, responsive, and user-friendly applications.

education.description: A Bachelor of Informatic Engineering with a focus on Software Engineering is an undergraduate degree program that combines the principles of computer science, information technology, and engineering with a deep emphasis on the design, development, and maintenance of software systems.
